lead_paragraph: When successful actress Georgia gets out of rehab for alcohol addiction, she faces several crises. First, her teenage daughter, with whom she has a rocky relationship, asks to move back in with her. Then her ex-husband approaches her about starring in a new drama he has written about their less-than-perfect marriage. And Georgia is also dealing with the drama of her best friends, a bitter socialite and an actor who self-medicates with food.
